summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2921, for the improvement of North and West 48th Street, from 11th Avenue Northwest, to Phinney Avenue, all in the City of Seattle,, by constructing sewers therein of proper materials and dimensions, together with all appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district; under Ordinance No. 35299 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
